Guy performs Dynamic Entry with Kakashi using his [[Sharingan]] to copy it. Kakashi applies lightning [[chakra]] to his Dynamic Entry, causing the technique to engulf the opponent in flames.

[[pl:Kopī Ninjutsu]]
